hero_description: Specialized in NLP, RAG and Generative AI
about_intro: Final-year student at ENSAI specializing in NLP and RAG architectures.
about_text: I'm passionate about AI and its real-world impact. I design innovative solutions that turn complex data into actionable insights, from natural language processing to scalable AI pipelines.
about_desc: I am passionate about NLP, Generative AI and robust pipelines. Check out my clean, local NLP pipeline and my advanced EDA notebook.
project1_desc: Local NLP pipeline for customer review moderation
project1_modal_desc: Complete local pipeline using BERT to detect and rewrite toxic customer reviews.
project2_desc: Comparative benchmark for RAG architectures on business docs
project3_desc: Exploratory analysis & toxicity flagging on millions of reviews
exp1_desc: Benchmarking RAG architectures to convert internal reports into a queryable knowledge base.
contact_text: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Drop me a message!
skills_adv_data_science_desc: Python (pandas, numpy, polars), advanced SQL, statistical modeling, automated EDA.
skills_adv_ml_desc: Supervised & unsupervised, time series, advanced feature engineering, deep learning (RNN, LSTM), interpretability (SHAP, LIME).
skills_adv_nlp_desc: Hybrid RAG pipelines, LLMs (LangChain, Hugging Face), embeddings, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, RAG evaluation.
skills_adv_dataeng_desc: Modular pipelines, ETL, CI/CD, orchestration, Git, Python APIs (FastAPI, Streamlit).
skills_adv_cloud_desc: AWS, Azure, GCP: deployment, storage, pipeline orchestration.
skills_adv_viz_desc: Matplotlib, Plotly, interactive dashboards (Streamlit, Panel), clear documentation.
